{"step_by_step_thinking": "CA maxillary sinus stage III (T3 N0 M0) refers to a cancer of the maxillary sinus that is moderately advanced but has not spread to lymph nodes or distant sites. The treatment of choice for this stage of cancer typically involves a combination of surgery and radiotherapy. Surgery is used to remove the tumor and any affected tissue, while radiotherapy is used to kill any remaining cancer cells and prevent recurrence. Chemotherapy is usually reserved for cases where the cancer has spread to other parts of the body, which is not the case here.", "answer_choice": "B. Surgery + Radiotherapy"}
